column4: ive got some issues with 7.10 that 7.07 didn't have... for instance firefox regularily freezes, i sometimes cant open folders on mounted ntfs drives, and third party software just... doesn't work (for instance truecrypt and vmware). Is 8.04 a little less buggy?
8.04 will be quite a bit less buggier since its going to be another LTS
do you think there's much chance that the 8.04 alpha 1 is less buggy than the 7.10 upgrade?
definately not, but when its actually released it will be
